title: help finding font
content:
i am working in a digital design class, i am trying to find the cover font, not the logo, to the rolling stone magazine with marilyn manson on the cover. the issue number is 797. i need the font style to create a faux mag cover.

any help would be greatly appreciated.
author: Suzanne Simon

comments.content:
Hi Suzanne, welcome to Typophile. You’d be better of posting this on the **[General Discussions](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419095845/http:/typophile.com/forum/4)** or **[Type ID Board](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419095845/http:/typophile.com/typeid)**. Including an image would also help.

Do you mean this one?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419095845im_/http:/typophile.com/files/cover_6063.jpg)
yes this is my mag model
